title: Projects
text:
All Languages Python HTML/JavaScript C++ Java Desmos 



    
      
      python
    
    
        
            Minecraft.py
            
                
            
        
        A custom Minecraft-inspired 3D renderer and sandbox, with easy custom model support, collision detection, perspective projections, and culling. Made in Python using Pygame as a canvas. Currenty a WIP.
    



    
      
      python
    
    
        
            Beat The Board
            
                
            
        
        A simulator to study the various responsibilities, powers, and checks of the government. Created to study for US History quizzes. Made in Python using Pygame for the backend.
    



    
      
      desmos
    
    
        
            Linear Transformation Visualizer
            
                
            
        
        A Desmos project to visualize the effect of linear transformations in two dimensions. Supports transformations of functions or an arbitrary 2D unit grid.
    



    
      
      desmos
    
    
        
            3D Graphing
            
                
            
        
        A 3D Desmos grapher in the 2D graphing calculator (made before 3D Desmos was released), supporting 3D cartesian, cylindrical, and spherical coordinates, perspective projection, parametric function graphing, and more!
    



    
      
      desmos
    
    
        
            Wedge Calculator
            
                
            
        
        A wedge calculator and visualizer in Desmos. Shows all forces for a simple wedge system
    



    
      
      python
    
    
        
            Wordle Discord Bot
            
                
            
        
        A Discord bot that lets you play Wordle with your friends! Uses the discord.py API wrapper, and repl.it with Flask to create a webserver to let it run in the background.
    



    
      
      python
    
    
        
            Tic Tac Toe Discord Bot
            
                
            
        
        A Discord bot that lets you play Tic Tac Toe with your friends! Uses the discord.py API wrapper, and repl.it with Flask to create a webserver to let it run in the background.
    



    
      
      python
    
    
        
            Translator Discord Bot
            
                
            
        
        A bot that lets you translate text directly in Discord! Uses the translators library for translation API, and pycord, repl.it and Flask for backend.
    



    
      
      c++
    
    
        
            Micromouse
            
                
            
        
        Meet Pixel, an autonomous maze-solving robot! Powered by an STM32 Nucleo, it runs floodfill to solve a maze as fast as possible! Includes a 2-wheel drivetrain, gyroscopic correction, and encoder odometry.

title: About Me
text:
Hi! My name is Priyam, and I’m a 17-year old who loves computer science and robotics!
In my free time, I’m probably reading a book, playing video games with my friends, or out camping with my Boy Scout troop! Check out what I’ve made on my projects page or look at my GitHub for new WIPs!

title: Home
text: Hello! I’m Priyam, a 17-year old who loves computer science! Check out some of my projects here or learn more about me here!
